reason: Good question about 사례금 상한액. Answer accurately covers 100만원 (교원), 40만원/60만원 (교육청 공무원), included/excluded items, and 소속변경 rule. All details verified against page 294 markdown.
Good question about handling excess honorarium. Answer correctly states 2일 이내 신고, 반환 의무, 증명자료 첨부. Well-structured answer distinct from template entries. Source text matches page 294 line 11.
Good question about monthly frequency limit. Answer correctly states 월 3회/6시간, 승인 requirement, and exclusions for 국가/지자체 requests and 겸직허가. Source text verified on page 294.

Source text matches page 294 lines 24-28. Answer accurately presents 외부강의등의 제한 content including 직무수행 저해 판단 시 제한, 월 3회/6시간 승인, and exclusions. No duplicates within this batch for this source segment.
